title: YOUTUBE | 薄熙来回应儿子开法拉利 Chinese Official :Oxford fully subsidized Foreign rich students
content:
Chinese Official Bo Xi Lai stated during people’s congress that Oxford fully subsidized Foreign rich students. Instead of using British Tax payers money to subsidize poor English student, the British Educational system fully subsidized rich foreign students. Shame on UK Shame on British Education system@ shame on British Financial fat cat!

视频在youtube上，如墙内读者无法观看，请发电邮至cdtchinese@chinadigitaltimes.net，标题中请包括”youtube”字样，数字时代将提供观看工具。
